snippet: The man, William Hershkovitz, who was participating in an internship and Hebrew study program in Eilat, was then fatally shot by the police.
abstract: William Herskowitz, New Yorker who was participating in internship and Hebrew study program in Eilat, Israel, opens fire in the Leonardo Club Hotel after being fired from the program; kills hotel cook Armando Abed before being fatally shot by the police.

byline.contributor: Irit Pazner-Garshowitz and Jonathan Rosen contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research from New York.

lead_paragraph: The man, William Hershkovitz, who was participating in an internship and Hebrew study program in Eilat, was then fatally shot by the police.

headline.seo: New York Man, Fired From Israeli Hotel, Kills Co-Worker
headline.main: New Yorker, Fired by Hotel in Israel, Kills Co-Worker
headline.print_headline: New Yorker, Fired by Hotel In Israel, Kills Co-Worker
